Behaviors

Download a PDF of all Behavior Change studies

The impact of media-based health education on tuberculosis diagnosis in Cali, Colombia

Jaramillo E
Health Policy Plan, 2001, 16(1): 68-73
Location Columbia
Population General public
Intervention Description Television and radio spots and public service announcements
Outcomes

Behaviors: Number of direct smears and number of people tested

Health: Number of new cases of positive pulmonary TB
Design Quasi-experimental
Sampling Method Probability
Strength of Evidence Score 4
Social Marketing Benchmark Criteria 6: Theory, Behavior, Customer orientation, Insight, Segmentation, Methods mix
